model.name: Wan2.2 Ovi v1.1 FastWan 5s 10B
model.description: Ovi will generate an Audio soundtrack with the Video. It is specialized in speaking characters. Use the tags <S> and <E> to delimit the speaker words and use Audio: as a prefix to set the background noise.

prompt: A singer in a glittering jacket grips the microphone, sweat shining on his brow, and shouts, <S>The end is night<E>. The crowd roars in response, fists in the air. Behind him, a guitarist steps to the mic and adds to say <S>We must all find a bunker where to hide.<E>. The energy peaks as the lights flare brighter.. Audio: Electric guitar riffs, cheering crowd, shouted male voices.
